title: Does Riot ever give LOSS PREVENTED?
body:
For real now, I HAVE TO GET A LOSS PREVENTED FROM SEASON 5...Did it got removed? I really want to know. 
I also include the game that i played earlier today, so you can see that i deserve a loss prevented here.

I had a decent farm, score, got 2 turrets, helped in teamfights but still my team sucked so much. I reported everyone for their actions. 


http://prntscr.com/fny77n  (This is the link for the screenshot)

replies.body:
You can get a loss prevention.....but never EVER EEEEVVEERRRR from that. If you couldn't carry them( it that it's easy), you didn't win, and you didn't earn the win. That's just how t works. You could have helped your team get on their feet, been supportive, there are many ways to win with less mechanically experienced teammates.

You will never get a loss prevention for anything excluding the server shooting itself in the foot and face. When it is 100% Riots fault. Not even from you getting DC'd, which is partially your fault. Only if it is unequivocally RIOTS. This is 100% NOT that. You lost fair and square.

[**Loss Prevention**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753014) is only turned on when the servers take a dive and nobody is able to login or finish their games. With that being said, we can't enable loss prevention for past seasons or games that were simply lost.

You never got loss prevented for people doing badly. You got loss prevented if riot servers were fucking up. Also reporting people for doing badly is against the rules, and will do nothing but get YOU punished.
